description:
With the latest eBay Fashion app, you can view inspirational looks, browse and buy from the world’s largest selection of new, branded, designer, and vintage merchandise. Millions of listings for clothing, shoes and accessories are at your fingertips. 

Now available for both iPad and iPhone, the eBay Fashion app brings shop-able inspiration to you anywhere.

Discover a great deal: Fashion Sales and Events curated for you offering exclusive, limited-time sales on clothing and accessories from today’s leading designers as well timely trends that are not to be missed.

Capture your inspiration: Use the Shop the Look feature to snap a picture of anything that catches your eye and find dresses, skirts, tops, pants and more that match that image. The options are endless and so is our inventory. Your photo. Our fashion. 

Features: 
•Discover new items based off of image swatches from photos on your device 
•Browse Curated Events, including sales, shops, and selections from our all new Designer Collective.
•Search or browse millions of clothes, shoes and accessories 
•Browse by Brand 
•Refine Search by size, condition, price and so much more 
•Full support for Apple TV AirPlay – discover new items and shop the Designer Collective and more on your HDTV using your iOS device as a trackpad to control the browsing experience.
•Share with Facebook, Twitter, email or text message 
•If you're new to eBay, register for an eBay account through the Fashion app
